actions.desc: The king kobold makes two shortsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Hand Crossbow

reactions.desc: The king kobold halves the damage from one attack that hits it. To do so, it must see the attacker.
reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge

special_abilities.desc: On each of its turns, the king kobold can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.
special_abilities.name: Cunning Action

special_abilities.desc: If the king kobold is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the king instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
special_abilities.name: Evasion

special_abilities.desc: The king has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the king’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.
special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics

special_abilities.desc: The king kobold deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the king that isn’t incapacitated and the king doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.
special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)

special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the king has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity

special_abilities.desc:
The king kobold is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared: 
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray
1st level (4 slots): alarm, grease, mage armor
2nd level (3 slots): alter self, hold person, invisibility
special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
